defaultTitle: Green-House Renewables | Solar Panels & Renewable Energy Ireland
defaultDescription: Ireland's trusted solar energy installer. Solar panels, battery storage, EV chargers & heat pumps. SEAI approved, 20+ years experience, 1,000+ happy customers.

business.name: Green-House Renewables
business.description: Ireland's trusted solar energy installer providing solar panels, battery storage, EV chargers, and heat pump solutions for homes and businesses. SEAI approved with 20+ years experience.

/.title: Green-House Renewables | Solar Panels & Renewable Energy Ireland
/.description: Ireland's trusted solar energy installer. Solar panels, battery storage, EV chargers & heat pumps. SEAI approved, 20+ years experience, 1,000+ happy customers.
/.keywords: solar panels Ireland, solar energy, renewable energy, SEAI grants, battery storage, EV chargers, Green-House Renewables

/about.title: About Us | Green-House Renewables - 20+ Years in Solar Energy
/about.description: Learn about Green-House Renewables, Ireland's trusted solar installer since 2006. SEAI approved, Safe Electric certified, with over 1,000 happy customers nationwide.
/about.keywords: about Green-House Renewables, solar energy company Ireland, SEAI approved installer, renewable energy experts

/solar-panels.title: Solar Panels Ireland | Residential Solar PV Systems | Green-House Renewables
/solar-panels.description: Professional solar panel installation across Ireland. Up to €2,100 SEAI grant, 0% VAT. Save up to 70% on electricity bills. Free quote available.
/solar-panels.keywords: solar panels Ireland, solar PV systems, residential solar, SEAI grant solar panels, solar panel installation Dublin

/battery-storage.title: Home Battery Storage Ireland | Sigenergy Systems | Green-House Renewables
/battery-storage.description: Home battery storage systems by Sigenergy. Store excess solar energy, reduce grid dependence, and power your home 24/7. Certified Sigenergy installers in Ireland.
/battery-storage.keywords: battery storage Ireland, home battery, Sigenergy battery, solar battery storage, energy storage systems

/commercial-solar.title: Commercial Solar Panels Ireland | Business Solar Solutions | Green-House Renewables
/commercial-solar.description: Commercial solar PV installations for Irish businesses. Reduce operating costs, meet sustainability targets, and benefit from SSAP grants. 1,000+ installations completed.
/commercial-solar.keywords: commercial solar Ireland, business solar panels, commercial solar installation, SSAP grants, corporate solar energy

/ev-chargers.title: EV Charger Installation Ireland | Home & Business | Green-House Renewables
/ev-chargers.description: Professional EV charger installation for homes and businesses across Ireland. SEAI grant available. Charge your electric vehicle with clean solar energy.
/ev-chargers.keywords: EV charger installation Ireland, electric vehicle charger, home EV charger, SEAI grant EV charger, EV charging station

/grants.title: SEAI Grants for Solar Panels Ireland 2025 | Green-House Renewables
/grants.description: Get up to €2,100 SEAI grant for solar panels in Ireland. 0% VAT on solar installations. We handle all the paperwork for you. Apply today.
/grants.keywords: SEAI grants, solar panel grants Ireland, SEAI solar grant, renewable energy grants, government grants solar

/finance.title: Solar Panel Finance Options Ireland | Green-House Renewables
/finance.description: Affordable solar panel finance through Finance Ireland. Flexible payment plans, no large upfront cost. Go solar today with easy monthly payments.
/finance.keywords: solar panel finance Ireland, solar payment plans, Finance Ireland solar, affordable solar panels, solar finance options

/funding-options.title: Business Solar Funding & SSAP Grants | Green-House Renewables
/funding-options.description: Business funding options for commercial solar. SSAP grants, accelerated capital allowances, and SEAI support schemes to reduce upfront costs.
/funding-options.keywords: SSAP grants, business solar funding, commercial solar grants, accelerated capital allowances, SEAI business grants

/contact.title: Contact Green-House Renewables | Free Solar Consultation Ireland
/contact.description: Contact Green-House Renewables for a free solar consultation. Call +353 1 207 0006, email info@green-house.ie. Deansgrange Business Park, Blackrock, Dublin.
/contact.keywords: contact Green-House Renewables, solar consultation Ireland, solar panel quote Dublin, renewable energy consultation

/quote-builder.title: Get a Free Solar Quote | Green-House Renewables Ireland
/quote-builder.description: Get a free, no-obligation quote for solar panels, battery storage, or EV chargers. SEAI grants available. Serving all of Ireland.
/quote-builder.keywords: free solar quote Ireland, solar panel quote, solar estimate, Green-House Renewables quote

/testimonials.title: Customer Reviews & Testimonials | Green-House Renewables
/testimonials.description: Read 100+ five-star reviews from happy Green-House Renewables customers. See why homeowners and businesses across Ireland trust us for solar installations.
/testimonials.keywords: Green-House Renewables reviews, solar panel reviews Ireland, customer testimonials, solar installer reviews

/privacy-policy.title: Privacy Policy | Green-House Renewables
/privacy-policy.description: Read the Green-House Renewables privacy policy. Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal data in compliance with GDPR.

/cookies.title: Cookie Policy | Green-House Renewables
/cookies.description: Learn about how Green-House Renewables uses cookies. Manage your cookie preferences and understand our cookie usage.
